quote: Why is it we have so little choice? We live like the lowliest worms. Always defeated - defeated we make dinner, we eat, we sleep. Everyone we love is dying. Sill, to cease living is unacceptable.
quote_letters: WHY IS IT WE HAVE SO LITTLE CHOICE WE LIVE LIKE THE LOWLIEST WORMS ALWAYS DEFEATED - DEFEATED WE MAKE DINNER WE EAT WE SLEEP EVERYONE WE LOVE IS DYING SILL TO CEASE LIVING IS UNACCEPTABLE
